Comments_List:
Identifying different pastes of ceramics, as well as symbolism on painted ceramics

Identifying use-wear by looking at the pot and sherds and then interpreting the type of cooking the pots were used for

Presentation skills

Writing skills in terms of research paper as well as labs

Studying and interpreting research studies in relation to factors of ceramics all over the world.
Meet more often, but otherwise fantastic.

YES

Really helps in understanding use of ceramics in antiquity, and interpreting sherds or pots in the field and in the lab.
